visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure the chart's background and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a custom background color and margin settings for better visual appeal. The x-axis displays month names with styled labels, while the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters with a title and grid line color. The data series contains monthly rainfall data, with a custom color applied to the series. Additionally, the legend is enabled with styled text to match the overall theme of the chart.
